→ Work Experience
10MonthsOct 2021 - PresentMarketing Officer
Asian Calibration Services Pvt Ltd.
As a Marketing Officer my core domain is to find & mature clients through social media
platfroms or through direct meetings.
Handle Marketing Campaigns.
Listen Client inquiry and share the Proposal with Client.
Once Client aprroved our Proposal, my job is to confirm when our technical team visit client
site to perform Calibration work.
After Calibration work my job is to share the invoice with Client.
I am also responsible for payment recoveries.
12MonthsSep 2020 - Sep 2021Bank Finance Coordinator
Pantera Energy Pvt Ltd
As a Bank Finance Coordinator, i gather all the necessary information from our client's to
pursue solar Financing Case.
After that i prepare Solar financing case and send to the Bank which are on our Company
Panel.
I call Banker and ask him about the financing cases progress and update our client's.
I was also responsible for recover the payment from Bank.
As a Bank Finance Coordinator my job is to Facilitate the clients who wants install solar on Bank
Financing.
6MonthsFeb 2020 - Aug 2020Account Executive
Pantera Energy (pvt) Ltd
As an Account Executive my job is to Maintain data in Quick book & Bizz Trax
Enter Petty Cash Bills in both Softwares
Enter Receipt  & Expense voucher in Quick book
Reconsile all Payable & Receivable data

Qamer Oil Mills
Badminton

i also collect petty cash from our client's

Future Now (Pvt) Limited
As a product sale executive my job was to take order from our Canadian based customers.
I also offer some add-ons to our customer according to company policies.
I send his order to the nearest shop of customer location & my campaign name was Pizza 73.
→ Projects

input.additional_info: LuxoTech Solutions values diversity and seeks candidates from a variety of backgrounds and experiences. Preferred institutions include the Institute of Business Administration, Karachi, and FAST NUCES. The company supports hybrid work arrangements and offers relocation assistance for exceptional candidates. Skills are assessed through a combination of technical tests, case studies, and structured interviews with panel members from various departments.
minimum_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
